item.title: silver elixir
item.content:encoded:
i see it.
phewwww
SILVER PETALS = DROPING FROM SHORTY OR STRAWBERRY
mix 2 silver petals = silver pair
mix 2 silver pair ( = 4 silver petals ) = silver clover
mix 2 silver clover ( = 8 silver petals ) = silver ringlet
mix 2 silver ringlet ( = 16 silver petals ) = silver emulsion
silver emulsion + potion base ( mix 2 boring bulb ) = silver elixir ( = 100.000 daily xp )
4 silver elixir = 52 silver petals + 8 boring bulb = 400.000 daily xp

ehmmmmmm :(
yeahh, ok, i will try it. :D

hai latinsnake, kamu jadi guru bvs aku ya. jangan pakai wiki, kelamaan. ya ya ya…
bantu aku jadi sannin :D

item.title: Re: butuh pencerahan
item.content:encoded:
butuh pencerahan (need help/explaination)

Kamu sudah main sampai Season Two tetapi masih tidak tahu bagaimana nak bingo orang? o.0

Kalau nak menjadi jonin, senang saja. Sekarang, special jonin boleh minum tiga Silver Elixir (bukan Silver Potion) dalam satu hari. Kalau mengguna Diet Ramen baru itu, boleh guna satu lagi Elixir. Setiap elixir memberi 100k daily XP, kalau minum empat elixir sudah ada 400k daily XP. Mendapat 100k lagi dari missions sangat senang. Guna Annie lvl 2 dan Timmy lvl 2 dalam team untuk menambah XP dari setiap mission. Jangan lupa mendapat Crazy Love Triangle, tiga ninja berpangkat jonin, dan tiga bloodline sebelum mula ujian jonin.

Bingo itu… Cubalah sendiri. =P

you're in season two but still do not know how to bingo?

if you want to be a jonin, it's easy. now, special jonin can use (minum = drink..but "use" is better word) three Silver Elixir (not Silver Potion) in a day. If you use (eat) the new Diet Ramen, you may use another Elixir. Every Elixir give 100k daily XP. If you use four elixir, you'll get 400kdaily XP. To get another 100k from missions is very easy. Use Annie lvl 2 and Timmy lvl 2 in team to add XP for every mission. Don't forget to get Crazy Love Triangle, three jonin ninja and three bloodline before start the jonin test.

About bingo..You should try.

p/s: i'm not Indonesian..but hopefully this translation will help you guys *_*

-Snake-

item.title: Re: butuh pencerahan
item.content:encoded: I think it should be made a rule that you must use English on here or provide a translation of the text.

item.title: Re: butuh pencerahan
item.content:encoded:
Kamu sudah main sampai Season Two tetapi masih tidak tahu bagaimana nak bingo orang? o.0

Kalau nak menjadi jonin, senang saja. Sekarang, special jonin boleh minum tiga Silver Elixir (bukan Silver Potion) dalam satu hari. Kalau mengguna Diet Ramen baru itu, boleh guna satu lagi Elixir. Setiap elixir memberi 100k daily XP, kalau minum empat elixir sudah ada 400k daily XP. Mendapat 100k lagi dari missions sangat senang. Guna Annie lvl 2 dan Timmy lvl 2 dalam team untuk menambah XP dari setiap mission. Jangan lupa mendapat Crazy Love Triangle, tiga ninja berpangkat jonin, dan tiga bloodline sebelum mula ujian jonin.

Bingo itu… Cubalah sendiri. =P

item.title: Re: butuh pencerahan
item.content:encoded: If you are having difficulty understanding the game because you don't know English then simply stop playing it! Daily XP isn't the same as XP & AP it's more of the experience you get from doing missions and counts towards your daily ranking. You can see how much points you get of daily ranking after you have completed a mission and the total number that you got so far under the Jutsu XP stat of your character's profile!! To bingo people you must be in a village and have spies on other peoples villages. You can sent spies yourself or another villager and then be able to bingo people or attack a village, every Bingo Attempt costs 50 stamina. There are two ways to bingo someone, you can either automatically bingo him using a Note Page or fight them and reduce their HP to zero. If you win the fight the other person gets bingo'ed and if you lose the fight then you get bingo'ed yourself, people who are bingo'ed can't help their village at Collecting, Patroling, Spying, Attacking and Bingoing for 34-36 hours generally!!!
